pkgmetadata.longdescription: Humane Interface to Amazon Web Services // An opinionated interface to Amazon Web Services https://aws.amazon.com, with functions for interacting with 'IAM' (Identity and Access Management), 'S3' (Simple Storage Service), 'RDS' (Relational Data Service), Redshift, and Billing. Lower level functions ('aws_' prefix) are for do it yourself workflows, while higher level functions ('six_' prefix) automate common tasks.
